fieldset.name: mega-params
fieldset.label: ZT Parameters (Extended parameters for ZT Megamenu.)

field.name: mega_nofollow
field.label: No Follow
field.description: Add rel=nofollow to link of menu.

field.name: mega_desc
field.label: Add Description
field.description: Description added here will be shown as the Tag line below the Menu Item Title. Works for Submenu items also.

field.name: mega_cols
field.label: Columns
field.description: Number of Columns. Works for first level menu items, with groups = Y for each subset going into each column.

field.name: mega_group
field.label: Group
field.description: Set to yes for number of columns per first level menu items.

field.name: mega_width
field.label: Submenu Width
field.description: Set width for submenu (Only use px. Eg: 500px)

field.name: mega_colw
field.label: Submenu Column Width
field.description: Set width for submenu column (Can use % or px). Eg: 250px

field.name: mega_colxw
field.label: Submenu Column[i] Width
field.description: Set width for each submenu column. (Use if you want set different width for each submenu column, can use px or %) Eg: colw1=200px or colw2=300px. Note: The columns are separated by new lines.

field.name: mega_class
field.label: Additional class
field.description: Additional CSS class to apply to the menu items.

field.name: mega_subcontent
field.label: Submenu Content
field.description: Choose content to show in submenus. Multiple modules based on name or module position can be selected and loaded. Use Ctrl + Click to select Multiple Items.
